snippet: The New York Times bureau chief in Beirut, Anne Barnard, shared some of her experiences during a recent visit to Homs, Syria, via Twitter.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times bureau chief in Beirut, Anne Barnard, shared some of her experiences during a recent visit to Homs, Syria, via Twitter.

headline.main: A Glimpse of Syrian Lives Ravaged by War in Homs
